name: The Darkness In The Nighmare
description:
This game was made by 3 Turkish teenagers and as a joke we did nothing for the first 2 days :D

We were planning to make the power up market system, but the time was not enough.

How To Play :

Jump Jump Jump (Space)

Theme :

Dark is Spreading

Game Type : Endless Runner

The Story Of The Game:

Having Nightmares A little boy gets up from his bed and hears a noise under his bed and starts running. His fear is too much. He tries to collect the teddy bears and go to his parents' bedroom so that he can reduce his fear.

References :

Music:

https://davidkbd.itch.io/eternity-metal-scfi-music-pack

Used Music Names : 

DavidKBD - Eternity Pack - 09 - Soul evisceration - loop

DavidKBD - Eternity Pack - 12 - At the Gates - loop
